Pattern Lab 2

Hey there. Along with Brad Frost and Dave Olsen, I help build Pattern Lab. We just finished a great workshop at WebDesignDay and want to tell you more about it.

Go read about it on Smashing Magazine: Making and Maintaining Atomic Design Systems with Pattern Lab 2. There's plenty of info there about what's new & how to get up and running.

We can't wait to see what you build with Pattern Lab!
